fields.label: Flexible content
fields.name: fc_content_types
fields.instructions: Use this to add different types of content to this page.

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: accordion_heading
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a heading for this entry.

sub_fields.label: Align buttons
sub_fields.name: buttons_align
sub_fields.instructions: Choose where you want the buttons aligned.

sub_fields.label: Open in new window/tab
sub_fields.name: button_target
sub_fields.instructions: Select whether to open on a new window/tab.

sub_fields.label: Button Link
sub_fields.name: cta_button_link
sub_fields.instructions: Paste a link or point to an anchor (ie. #request_demo).

sub_fields.label: Name
sub_fields.name: carousel_item_name
sub_fields.instructions: Add here the name of the company/entity.

sub_fields.label: Open in new window?
sub_fields.name: carousel_item_target
sub_fields.instructions: Check to open link in a new window.

sub_fields.label: Address
sub_fields.name: contact_address
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the address and press enter.

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: feature_heading
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a heading for this feature.

sub_fields.label: Image alignment
sub_fields.name: feature_image_align
sub_fields.instructions: Choose where you want the image aligned.

sub_fields.label: Image as background
sub_fields.name: feature_image_bg
sub_fields.instructions: Select this to set the image as background.

sub_fields.label: Video ID
sub_fields.name: feature_video_id
sub_fields.instructions: If you want a video to play when clicking on the image, paste here a YouTube video ID.

sub_fields.label: Boxes per row
sub_fields.name: feature_boxes_per_row
sub_fields.instructions: Select the number of boxes per row to display.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: feature_box_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Paste an icon class from here.

sub_fields.label: Load form
sub_fields.name: feature_box_load_form
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to load a form on click.

sub_fields.label: Boxes per row
sub_fields.name: feature_boxes_per_row
sub_fields.instructions: Select the number of boxes per row to display.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: feature_box_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Paste an icon class from here.

sub_fields.label: Load form
sub_fields.name: feature_box_load_form
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to load a form on click.

sub_fields.label: Centre heading
sub_fields.name: heading_center
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to centre the section heading.

sub_fields.label: Tab name
sub_fields.name: tab_name
sub_fields.instructions: Section tab <small>(requires enabling Tab Scrollbar under Options tab).</small>

sub_fields.label: Full width
sub_fields.name: fc_full_width
sub_fields.instructions: Select Yes to make the content fill the width of the page.

sub_fields.label: Grey Background
sub_fields.name: fc_grey_bg
sub_fields.instructions: Gives this section a light grey background.

sub_fields.label: Curved Separator
sub_fields.name: fc_has_curved_separator
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to display a curved separator.

sub_fields.label: Items per row
sub_fields.name: items_per_row
sub_fields.instructions: Select the number of items per row to display.

sub_fields.label: Gallery
sub_fields.name: gallery
sub_fields.instructions: Add images to create a gallery.

sub_fields.label: Number of boxes per row
sub_fields.name: grid_boxes_num
sub_fields.instructions: Number of boxes to display per row.

sub_fields.label: Image alignment
sub_fields.name: grid_box_image_alignment
sub_fields.instructions: Select the position of the image.

sub_fields.label: Text alignment
sub_fields.name: grid_box_overlay_text_align
sub_fields.instructions: Select the alignment of the text.

sub_fields.label: Overlay content
sub_fields.name: grid_box_overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Select Yes to overlay the content on top of the image. This will override the image alignment option.

sub_fields.label: Overlay opacity
sub_fields.name: grid_box_overlay_opacity
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a value between 0 and 1 (0 being 0% and 1 being 100%).

sub_fields.label: Size
sub_fields.name: masonry_circle_size
sub_fields.instructions: Select the size of the circle

sub_fields.label: Open in a new tab?
sub_fields.name: masonry_circle_target
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to open the link in a new tab.

sub_fields.label: Items per row
sub_fields.name: icon_grid_items
sub_fields.instructions: Select the number of items to show per row.

sub_fields.label: Text Align
sub_fields.name: icon_grid_text_align
sub_fields.instructions: Select how the text should be aligned.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon_grid_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Paste an icon class from here.

sub_fields.label: Icon image
sub_fields.name: icon_grid_icon_img
sub_fields.instructions: If circular image is required - please make sure image is square.

sub_fields.label: Links to
sub_fields.name: icon_grid_links_to
sub_fields.instructions: Paste a url if you want to link this item.

sub_fields.label: Boxes per row
sub_fields.name: boxes_per_row
sub_fields.instructions: Select the number of boxes per row to display.

sub_fields.label: Grid Links
sub_fields.name: grid_links
sub_fields.instructions: Select what pages you want to display on the grid.

sub_fields.label: Latest added
sub_fields.message: The latest blog will be displayed.

sub_fields.label: Random
sub_fields.message: On every page load, a random blog will be displayed.

sub_fields.label: Youtube Video ID
sub_fields.name: ms_video_id
sub_fields.instructions: Paste the YouTube video ID here.

sub_fields.label: Latest added
sub_fields.message: The latest property added in the feed will be displayed.

sub_fields.label: Random
sub_fields.message: On every page load, a random property will be displayed.

sub_fields.label: Latest added
sub_fields.message: The latest testimonial will be displayed.

sub_fields.label: Random
sub_fields.message: On every page load, a random testimonial will be displayed.

sub_fields.label: Pricing Table
sub_fields.message: This field has no options and will simply output the Pricing Table.

sub_fields.label: Heading
sub_fields.name: tab_heading
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a heading for this tab.

sub_fields.label: Team (Full)
sub_fields.message: This block has no fields or options. It will simply display all the team members in the order set in the WordPress Dashboard.

sub_fields.label: Team Members
sub_fields.name: team_members
sub_fields.instructions: Click on the team members on the left to add them to the right column.

sub_fields.label: How many?
sub_fields.name: testimonials_number
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the number of testimonials to display. Use "-1" for all.

sub_fields.label: Carousel
sub_fields.name: testimonials_carousel
sub_fields.instructions: This will turn testimonials into a carousel.

sub_fields.label: Type
sub_fields.name: featured_review_type
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the type of review e.g. Happy...Sellers

sub_fields.label: Open in a new tab?
sub_fields.name: testimonials_feature_box_link_target
sub_fields.instructions: Enable to open the link in a new tab

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: timeline_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Paste an icon class from here.

sub_fields.label: YouTube Video ID
sub_fields.name: video_id
sub_fields.instructions: Paste the YouTube video ID here.

sub_fields.label: Short video text
sub_fields.name: video_text
sub_fields.instructions: Enter here a short description of the video.

sub_fields.label: Workshops
sub_fields.message: This field has no options and will simply output workshop dates.

fields.label: Enable Tab Scrollbar
fields.name: fc_tab_scroller
fields.instructions: Check this box to display a top menu scroll bar.
